title: Keep Getting Disconnected
body: I keep getting disconnected when I'm in queue. And I was playing rocket league the whole time, so I know it's not my internet.

replies.body: Thanks for the reports here!  We hear you and are looking into these disconnects.  We've sent out some messaging on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, so bookmark it as we continue to dig into this.  I'll let you know if I have more info to share.
I'm having the same issues dude
A lot of people are having this problem... Hopefully the Devs are going to give us back our collective LP lost
